doclet.comment:
/**
 * @tsdoc directive
 * @name tsPrice
 *
 * @description
 * Displays a price.
 *
 * @param {number} value Value to display.
 * @param {string} text Text to display if no value provided.
 */
doclet.name: tsPrice

params.description: Text to display if no value provided.
params.name: text
